about_the_game:
In the world of Túatha, Ink Blooms are a vital resource infused with the magics of the wilds. Dried and ground into powder, Ink Blooms are a versatile material that makes it easier to shape the magical properties of crafts and wares. Common and invaluable, they’re woven into the fabric of everyday works from simple notes and messages to complex talismans and tools.

The Village: Ink Bloom DLC unlocks the Ink Bloom badge and description on the main menu, a potent way of showing your support for Túatha Echoes: The Village.

This DLC *Does Not* expand or affect the story of The Village.
